text: Aur ehal-kitab kay sath behas-o-mubahisa na kero magar iss tareeqay per jo umdah ho magar unn kay sath jo unn mein zalim hain aur saaf aeylaan kerdo kay humara to iss kitab per bhi eman hai jo hum per utari gaee hai aur iss per bhi jo tum per utari gaee hai humara tumhara mabood aik hi hai. Hum sab ussi kay hukum bardaar hain
